amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the President to direct the U.S. Permanent Representative to work to strengthen and expand the Social Protection sector of the International Labor Organization (ILO) in order to allow the ILO to issue more field and regional units of the ILO, to increase site inspections of working conditions, and to issue more reports on such conditions to the international community.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part 2 of House Report 109-132 to add `strengthening of international labor rights' as another U.N. reform and adds it to the certification and withholding process of section 601.
